mdRecord.dcterms:title: Barter Theatre: Aug 24 thru 26
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for plays at the Barter Theatre. Productions include: Take Her, She's Mine, Aug 24-26 | Androcles and the Lion, Aug 24-25 | Critic's Choice, Aug 27-29 | Witness for the Prosecution, Aug 31.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
